title: DON'T ASK FOR PREMADES FOR ONSLAUGHT HERE
body:
IT'S A HUGE WASTE OF TIME. There's no dodge timer on Invasion. You can surrender the second the game starts.

Just get into the lobby and ask whoever you got matchmade with to premake with you - there's about a 90% chance that they're also looking for people to do the missions with.

replies.body: Looking for premade for Onslaught, anyone wants?

> [{quoted}](name=The White Hatter,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=TKEl0iT3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-17T05:40:40.363+0000)
>
> Looking for premade for Onslaught, anyone wants?

Triggered!!!
I'm at the point where I'm just playing the mode for fun but I'm still happy to help people do the missions.
